Text: Islam and Socialism make a nice married couple. Both are all about domination and death to all opposition.

And Capitalism & Christianity are not about domination and death to all opposition.  My God you are ignorant! It is Christianity & Islam that are a nice married couple. Responsible for 98% of the world's problems. Eliminate them both and we truly would have heaven on Earth.
And by the way, ask a Christian fundamentalist what their God has in store for you if you're one of their "infidels."
